card.name: Colossus
card.property: Colossus can have 1 additional tough status card. Steel Skin - Response: After you change to this form, give Colossus a tough status card.

alternate.name: Piotr Rasputin
alternate.property: Setup: Search your deck for a copy of Organic Steel and add it to your hand. Aspiring Artist - Response: After you change to this form, shuffle a Colossus card from your discard pile into your deck.

card.name: Shadowcat
card.property: Shadowcat ignores the guard and patrol keywords, and any crisis icons ([crisis]) in play.

card.name: Piotr's Studio
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Piotr's Studio → discard cards from your deck until you discard a Colossus card. Add that card to your hand.

card.name: Iron Will
card.property: Colossus gets +1 THW. Response: After a tough status card is discarded from Colossus, draw 1 card.

card.name: Titanium Muscles
card.property: Colossus gets +1 ATK. Hero Resource: Exhaust this card → generate a [physical] resource for each tough status card on Colossus.

card.name: Organic Steel
card.property: Uses (2 steel counters). Hero Response: After a tough status card is discarded from Colossus, exhaust this card and remove 1 steel counter from it → give Colossus a tough status card.

card.name: Made of Rage
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When you make a basic attack, discard a tough status card from your hero → you get +6 ATK for that attack. That attack gains overkill.

card.name: Steel Fist
card.property: Hero Action: Deal 5 damage to an enemy. You may discard a tough status card from your hero → stun and confuse that enemy.

card.name: Bulletproof Protector
card.property: Hero Action: Discard a tough status card from your hero → choose: â€¢ Give your hero 2 tough status cards. â€¢ Ready your hero.

card.name: Armor Up
card.property: Alter-Ego Interrupt: When the villain activates, change to hero form.

card.name: Nightcrawler
card.property: Interrupt: When an [[X-MEN]] character would take any amount of damage from an enemy attack, spend a [energy] resource and return Nightcrawler to your hand → prevent all of that damage.

card.name: Polaris
card.property: Response: After Polaris enters play, give an [[X-MEN]] character a tough status card.

card.name: Protective Training
card.property: Attach to an [[X-MEN]] ally. Max 1 [[Training]] upgrade per ally. Attached ally gets +3 hit points.

card.name: Powerful Punch
card.property: Hero Interrupt (attack/defense): When an enemy initiates an attack, deal 4 damage to that enemy.

card.name: Bait and Switch
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): The villain attacks you. Remove 4 threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Perseverance
card.property: Hero Response: After you change form, give your hero a tough status card.

card.name: Mutant Protectors
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait. Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, put an [[X-MEN]] ally into play from your hand. Exhaust it and declare it the defender for this attack.

card.name: Defensive Energy
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Hero Interrupt: When you spend this card to play a [[Defense]] event, draw 1 card.

card.name: Professor X
card.property: Forced Response: After Professor X enters play, choose one: confuse the villain, stun a minion, or ready an [[X-MEN]] character. At the end of the round, if Professor X is still in play, discard him.

card.name: The X-Jet
card.property: Resource: Exhaust The X-Jet → generate a [wild] resource for a player whose identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait.

card.name: Shadow and Steel
card.property: Team-Up (Colossus and Shadowcat). Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt (attack/defense): When an enemy attacks, prevent all damage from that attack and deal 4 damage to the attacking enemy.

card.name: Energy
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Genius
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Strength
card.property: Max 1 per deck.

card.name: Shadowcat
card.property: Selective Intangibility - While you are in Phased mass form, Shadowcat ignores the guard and patrol keywords, and any crisis icons ([crisis]) in play.

alternate.name: Kitty Pride
alternate.property: Setup: Put your mass form upgrade into play, Solid side faceup. Phase Control - Action: Flip your mass form upgrade. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Solid
card.property: Mass form. Permanent. Hero Resource: Exhaust this card → generate a [physical] resource for an [[attack]] or [[defense]] event. Response: After you attack or defend in Solid mass form, flip this card.

alternate.name: Phased
alternate.property: Mass form. Permanent. While Shadowcat is defending, she cannot take damage. Forced Response: After you attack or defend in Phased mass form, flip this card.

card.name: Lockheed
card.property: Response: After Lockheed enters play, if you are in: â€¢ Solid mass form, deal 2 damage to an enemy. â€¢ Phased mass form, remove 2 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Kitty's Room
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Kitty's Room → if you are in: â€¢ Solid mass form, heal 2 damage from Kitty Pryde. â€¢ Phased mass form, draw 1 card.

card.name: Acute Control
card.property: Hero Response: After you ignore the guard or patrol keyword on a minion, exhaust Acute Control → deal 2 damage to that minion.

card.name: Intangible Interference
card.property: Hero Response: After you ignore the crisis icon ([crisis]) on a scheme, exhaust Intangible Interference → remove 2 threat from that scheme.

card.name: Phased and Confused
card.property: Hero form only. Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy would attack, discard this card insted. Then, confuse that enemy.

card.name: Shadowcat Surprise
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Ready your hero.

card.name: Phase Strike
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 6 damage to an enemy. If you are in Phased mass form, you may discard an attachment with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" from that enemy.

card.name: Airwalk
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 2 threat from a scheme (4 threat instead if you are in Phased mass form).

card.name: Quick Shift
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy attacks, if you are in: â€¢ Solid mass form, change to Phased mass form. â€¢ Phased mass form, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Wolverine
card.property: [star] Wolverine's attacks gain piercing. Response: After your turn begins, heal 1 damage from Wolverine.

card.name: Magik
card.property: Response: After you play Magik from your hand, spend a [mental] resource → choose a non-[[Elite]] minion engaged with an [[X-MEN]] hero. Shuffle that minion into the encounter deck.

card.name: Attack Training
card.property: Attach to an [[X-MEN]] ally. Max 1 [[Training]] upgrade per ally. Attached ally gets +1 ATK and +2 hit points.

card.name: Gatekeeper
card.property: Attach to a minion. Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains patrol. Interrupt: When attached minion is defeated, remove 4 threat from the main scheme.

card.name: Team Strike
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[X-MEN]] trait. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust your hero and any number of [[X-MEN]] allies → deal X damage among enemies in play, where X is the total ATK of the characters you exhausted this way.

card.name: Toe to Toe
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Choose an enemy. That enemy attacks you. Deal 5 damage to that enemy.

card.name: Aggressive Energy
card.property: Max 2 per deck. Hero Interrupt: When you spend this card to play a [[Attack]] event, that event deals 1 additional damage.

card.name: Colossus
card.property: Reduce the cost to play Colossus by 1 if your identity has the [[MUTANT]] or [[X-MEN]] trait. Toughness.

card.name: X-Mansion
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust X-Mansion → heal 1 damage from a [[MUTANT]] or [[X-MEN]] character. Any player whose alter-ego has the [[MUTANT]] trait may trigger this ability.

card.name: Ready to Rumble
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Hero Response: After you change form, discard this card → ready your hero.

alternate.name: Metro P.D.
alternate.property: Permanent. The first player controls Metro P.D.

alternate.name: Magneto
alternate.property: Victory 1. The first player controls Magneto. He does not count against your ally limit. [star] Response: After Magneto attacks and defeats a [[SENTINEL]] minion, heal 1 damage from Magneto.

card.name: Juggernaut
card.property: Stalwart. Toughness.

card.name: White Queen
card.property: Villainous.

card.name: Hellfire Pawn
card.property: Guard. Patrol. Surge.

card.name: Sabretooth II
card.property: Toughness.

card.name: Sabretooth III
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness.

card.name: Robert Kelly
card.property: The first player controls Robert Kelly. He does not count against your ally limit and cannot have player cards attached. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy resolves an undefended attack against you, deal the damage to Robert Kelly.

card.name: Medical Emergency
card.property: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Victory 1.

card.name: Blob
card.property: Guard.

card.name: The Brotherhood
card.property: Hinder 2[per_hero].

card.name: Mystique
card.property: Toughness.

card.name: Sentinel I
card.property: Toughness.

card.name: Sentinel II
card.property: Steady. Toughness.

card.name: Sentinel III
card.property: Stalwart. Toughness.

alternate.name: Jubilee
alternate.property: Victory -1. The first player controls Jubilee. She does not count against your ally limit. Action: Exhaust Jubilee and spend a [energy] resource → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Rictor
card.property: [star] Response: After Rictor attacks, deal 1 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with you.

card.name: Boom Boom
card.property: [star] Response: After Boom Boom attacks an enemy, place 1 bomb counter on it. At the end of the player phase, remove all bomb counters from play and deal 2 damage to each enemy for each bomb counter removed from it this way.

card.name: Cannonball
card.property: [star] Cannonball takes -1 consequential damage after he attacks and defeats a minion.

card.name: Wolfsbane
card.property: [star] Wolfbane's attacks gain piercing.

card.name: Sentinel Mark IV
card.property: Guard. Patrol.

card.name: Gauntlet Beam
card.property: Attach to the villain. [star] The villain's attacks gain piercing and ranged.

card.name: Learning A.I.
card.property: Attach to the villain. [star] The villain gains retaliate 1.

card.name: Adaptive Armor
card.property: Attach to the villain. [star] The villain gets +8 hit points.

card.name: Abduction Protocols
card.property: Hinder 2[per_hero]. Victory 2.

card.name: Sentinel Mark III
card.property: Toughness.

card.name: Sentinel Mark VI
card.property: Quickstrike.

card.property: Stalwart. Toughness.

card.property: Stalwart. Toughness.

card.property: Toughness. Victory 2.

card.property: Steady. Toughness.

alternate.property: Attach to Magneto. Permanent. Magneto loses steady.

card.name: M-Type Sentinel
card.property: Guard.

card.name: Magneto's Helmet
card.property: Attach to Magneto. Magneto cannot be confused.

card.name: Magneto's Armor
card.property: Attach to Magneto. Magneto cannot be stunned.

card.name: Magnetic Bubble
card.property: Attach to Magneto. Magneto gains retaliate 1.
